reviews.author: Katja M.
reviews.text: Good and fresh breakfast selection with baguettes, rolls, fresh toppings, and salads at reasonable prices. Staff described as friendly.

reviews.author: MrsTin
reviews.text: Wonderful cakes, delicious pastries and good ice cream. Ice cream at €0.80 per scoop is substantial in size. Recommends the covered apple cake with cream.

reviews.author: Wolfgang W.
reviews.text: Turkish breakfast featuring rolls, ham, egg, goat cheese, and fried sucuk. Staff noted as very nice and friendly.

reviews.author: Basti9
reviews.text: Praised strawberry and stracciatella ice cream quality at €0.80/scoop. Appreciates no upcharge for cups versus cones.

reviews.author: Atir S.
reviews.text: Praised ice cream flavors, particularly chocolate and mango, though prefers eating from a cone.

reviews.author: Agnieszka S.
reviews.text: The café offers breakfast from €1.95, sandwiches, and warm meals alongside ice cream and coffee.

notes: Google Maps reviews were not accessible due to consent redirect. Reviews collected from Unilocal.net. Yelp shows 10-11 total reviews but content was not extractable.
